title: #312: "Allen v. Farrow" - Part 6
description:
We continue our analysis of the case of Dylan Farrow. Jim explains how to understand Moses Farrow's recent change of heart and his defense of Woody Allen against the allegations of child sexual abuse by his sister Dylan. Laura gives us some shocking statistics about how family courts deal with allegations of child sexual abuse and the dire need for education and training. It is important to note that Woody Allen has always denied any wrongdoing and has never been charged nor convicted of any crime. 

#victimsmatter

#dylanfarrow

#miafarrow

#woodyallen

#janedoefilms

#allenvfarrow


You can hear all of the clips used in our episode in their entirety here:


CBS news reporting on Moses Farrow

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cHfBzQqe5ms&t=130s

Lifetime Intimate Portrait of Mia Farrow

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D5FRd99oSpk&t=1694s

Report regarding Alec Baldwin's defense of Woody Allen. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eJQ5dO5egMQ

We take apart this emotional, far-from-usual, detective series that punches you right in the gut each and every episode. Plus we have on a very special guest!  Kate Winslet's personal dialect coach, Susan Hegarty will tell us what it is like helping Kate get that "Delco" accent down!
